country-year: Total government spending, 2012 USD, net of general budget support ODA and disbursements on debt to the public sector
Development Initiatives, based on IMF World Economic Outlook, OECD DAC, World Bank

Calculated from IMF WEO data on government spending as a proportion of GDP. Receipts of general budget support ODA and disbursements on public debt are subtracted from total government spending to avoid double counting when comparing with international resource flows.
Total spent by the government for the year
